DOC.brief_title: Randomized Trial:the Effect of Liquid Food on the Intake of Energy and Protein in Malignant Hematologic Patients
DOC.detailed_description: The study investigates the effect of liquid food on the intake of energy and protein compared to solid food. One group will receive dietary counselling in fulfilling their need for energy and protein from liquid food and the other group from solid food. Both groups need to register their dietary intake in a period of 14 days and will be weighed three times during the intervention. At the end of the intervention they need to fill out a questionnaire.
DOC.criteria: patients with leukemia, lymphoma or other malignant hematological disease adults be able to talk and understand danish be able to eat both solid and liquid food not able to cooperate need for total tube or parenteral nutrition need for dialysis
